mapper.select: SELECT code AS "code" , code_nm AS "codeNm" , code_grp_cd AS "group_code" , chk_cd1 AS "chk_cd1" , chk_cd2 AS "chk_cd2" FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_GRP_CD IN ${code_grp_cd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND CODE !='CODE' ORDER BY CODE_GRP_CD, ORD_NO
SELECT CORP_CD as code , CORP_NM as codeNm , 'CORP_CD' AS "group_code" FROM TB_CORP WHERE 1= 1 AND CORP_TYPE = 'LN' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2
SELECT AGENCY_NO as code , AGENCY_NM as codeNm , 'AGENCY_NO' AS "group_code" FROM TB_AGENCY WHERE 1= 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2
